mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.*,
FROM AUTHEN_ENDUSER_LOGIN_ACCOUNT T LEFT JOIN CM_USER_INFO V ON T.USER_ID=V.USER_ID ) TB WHERE 1=1
mapper.update: UPDATE AUTHEN_ENDUSER_LOGIN_ACCOUNT SET UPDATED_DT = , UPDATED_BY = #{mdps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_SID = #{mdss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{dataDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMIN_ID = #{userInfo.atid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_ACCOUNT = #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{accountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENCRYPTION_TYPE = #{encryptionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ENDUSER_LOGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = #{atid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ENDUSER_LOGIN_ACCOUNT_ID, CREATED_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_SID, UPDATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_SID, REMARK, ACCOUNT_PASSWORD, , V.* from AUTHEN_ENDUSER_LOGIN_ACCOUNT T LEFT JOIN V_USER_AUTH V ON T.USER_ACCOUNT=V.ACCOUNT where ENDUSER_LOGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = #{atid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
